summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5904 for the improvement of 38th Avenue West from West Dravus Street to Ruffner Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77918, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
